title: Constructing and calculating Adams operations on dualisable topological modular forms. (arXiv:2104.13407v2 [math.AT] UPDATED)
description: We construct Adams operations on the cohomology theory Tmf of topological modular forms; the first such stable operations on this cohomology theory. These Adams operations are then calculated on the Tmf-cohomology of spheres using a combination of descent spectral sequences, motivic homotopy theory, and Anderson duality. Applications of these operations are then given, including constructions of connective height 2 analogues of Adams summands and image of J spectra.
dc:creator: Jack Morgan Davies
